name: Happy Yak Bengali Rice
description: Inspired by a particularly delicious trip to India, Happy Yak’s Bengali rice is loaded with crunchy pistachios, sweet aromas of curry and coriander, tender vegetables and rice.Ingredients: rice, dehydrated soy chunks [texturized soy protein, water, corn semola, beef flavoured broth (hydrolyzed corn protein, glucose solids, potato starch, sugar, caramel, yeast extract, onion powder, spices), rolled oats, wheat flour, onion flakes, spices], bengali seasonings [beef flavoured broth (hydrolyzed corn protein, glucose solids, potato starch, sugar, caramel, yeast extract, onion powder, spices), spices, sugar, garlic powder, citric acid], pistachios, freeze-dried peas, freeze-dried shallots, freeze-dried red bell pepper.May contain: nuts, peanuts, sesame, milk, egg and shrimp.
